New Records: Fazalhaq Farooqi took 5 wickets for 11 runs in 4 overs
Key Match Events: Uganda was bowled out for 58 in 16 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Uganda won the toss and elected to bowl
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan handed Uganda a harsh initiation in the World Cup debut
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Guyana National Stadium
Others: Fazalhaq Farooqi was awarded the Player of the Match
